1. The scope of application of privacy policies

This policy is applicable to you with various products and services provided to you with a website, application, API/SDK and background systems, operating systems, and new forms that emerge with technology development, as well as hardware terminals including the aforementioned products and services (It is called "Gaode Products and Services").
If the affiliated company has a privacy policy for the products or services it provides you, the corresponding privacy policy is applicable to the corresponding products or services.

We and the affiliated company have a privacy policy (such as Gaode member account service and car service service) for the products or services that it provided to you, and this policy is also applicable to this part of the product or service.

The content of Gaode products and services you have obtained may be different from the software versions you use and equipped with equipment.) Instead of covering certain services or not providing specific functions, the provisions of this privacy policy involving the above service/function and related personal information will not be applicable.
Except for the relevant information collection and use activities described in this policy, this policy is not applicable to the products and services you provided in other third directions.

When you use the services provided by a third party through Gaode products or services, your information should apply the rules of personal information collection and use of third parties. We will clearly notify that the service is provided by a specific third party on the specific service page, and it is highly recommendedUnder the use of the above -mentioned third -party products and services (especially services related to personal information), understand and confirm the privacy protection of the product and service provider.
